channel.title: They Might Be Giants Podcast
channel.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
channel.description: Direct from Brooklyn's own They Might Be Giants, this is the only authorized and official podcast from the band. Often imitated, never remunerated. Specializing in original, live and/or rare material from the band, please enjoy TMBG's finest podcast!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The official podcast of They Might Be Giants.
channel.itunes:summary: Direct from Brooklyn's own They Might Be Giants, this is the only authorized and official podcast from the band. Often imitated, never remunerated. Specializing in original, live and/or rare material from the band, please enjoy TMBG's finest podcast!
channel.itunes:keywords: They Might Be Giants, TMBG, John Flansburgh, John Linnell, Birdhouse in Your Soul, Istanbul, Homestar,

item.title: Whole Lot of Glean
item.itunes:author: They Might Be Giants
item.description: Direct from Brooklyn's own They Might Be Giants, this is the only authorized and official podcast from the band. Often imitated, never remunerated. Specializing in original, live and/or rare material from the band, please enjoy TMBG's finest podcast!
item.itunes:subtitle: TMBG's new album GLEAN is available for pre-order in all formats including special edition vinyl. http://bit.ly/1GPEB2o All pre-orders receive a free bonus set of videos. It's VIDEO JAIL. Save on bundles and dig the new 6 FINGERS OF GLEAN t-shirt.
item.itunes:summary: TMBGs new album GLEAN is available for pre-order in all formats including special edition vinyl. http://bit.ly/1GPEB2o All pre-orders receive a free bonus set of videos. It's VIDEO JAIL. Save on bundles and dig the new 6 FINGERS OF GLEAN t-shirt.
item.itunes:keywords: They Might Be Giants, TMBG, John Flansburgh, John Linnell, Birdhouse in Your Soul, Istanbul, Glean, Dial-a-Song, dialasong.com
